Name: Slice of Life Fantasy
About the game: Try to get a girlfriend and be a hero at the same time, in this single player RPG where you get loot from monsters in order to buy your girl stuff, Explore a Open World collecting Itens, completing trials in order to become a hero, and jorney forth to save you home and the people you love Key Features: Find Your Way You decide what you want to do, take your time, or rush the main quest in order to save what's important to you. Explore the World. There is a vast world filled with loot and goodies to collect, kill monster for even more goodies! Get a companion Earn a girls heart in order to complete the main quest of the game, It's dangerous to go alone!
